trans-unit.source: This module provides functionality for starting, stopping and restarting daemons. It also provides a simple utility for reading the command line arguments and determining which action to perform from them.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块提供了启动、停止和重新启动守护进程的功能。它还提供了一个简单的实用程序,用于读取命令行参数,并根据这些参数决定要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: initd: module for simplifying creation of initd daemons.
trans-unit.target: initd:用于简化initd守护进程的创建的模块。
